text: Turk 182 is a 1985 American action comedy drama movie directed by Bob Clark and starring Robert Ulrich, Timothy Hutton, Kim Cattrall, Robert Culp, Darren McGavin, Steven Keats, Paul Sorvino, Peter Boyle. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 action movies Category:1985 comedy-drama movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy- drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bob Clark Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Turk 182
